title: Dinnerbone&Jeb: 本周可能有预发布版
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-8-18 16:56 编辑 

Dinnerbone: We may or may not be looking to do a pre-release this week. Maybe. Possibly. You didn't hear it from me, though!
Jeb: This week will do a push to get a 1.8 pre-release out. No guarantees, as always.



Dinnerbone: 我们本周大概会 也有可能不会制作预发布版。大概。有可能。你就当做我没说过吧！
Jeb: 本周我们会加把劲来发布1.8预发布版。像往常一样——不保证。




哇哇哇 晚餐骨好伟大
